Description
<<<<<<< HEAD In this function signal is convoluted against a sigmoid window of width w and risetime rc with the units of these parameters relative to the value of the sampling frequency given in Fs (Default value=1).
Example : 1
[a,b]=movingrms ([4.4 94 1;-2 5*%i 5],1,-2) // moving rms with default value of Fs = 1
Example : 2
[a,b]=movingrms ([4.4 94 1;-2 5*%i 5],1,-2,2)// moving rms with value of Fs = 2
======= This is an Octave function. The signal is convoluted against a sigmoid window of width w and risetime rc with the units of these parameters relative to the value of the sampling frequency given in Fs (Default value=1).
Examples
1. [a,b]=movingrms ([4.4 94 1;-2 5i 5],1,-2) a = 0.91237 17.71929 0.96254 0.91237 17.71929 0.96254 b = 0.18877 0.18877 2. [a,b]=movingrms ([4.4 94 1;-2 5i 5],1,-2,2) a = 4.8332 93.8669 5.0990 4.8332 93.8669 5.0990 b = 1 1
